intro: Rinorea lindeniana var. lindeniana, commonly known as the Lindena or Lindensia, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It is a shrub or small tree that typically grows to a height of 3–5 meters. The plant features opposite, lanceolate leaves that are usually glossy and dark green. It produces small, fragrant white or pale yellow flowers arranged in clusters. The fruit is a capsule that splits open to release small, winged seeds.
